title: Status with future finalized epoch
body:
When syncing I see this log a lot. Is it a problem? Why is this information logged?
```
2021-01-19 04:14:09 [SYNC]             info: Sync progress 10910/10949 - 2.5 minutes left - 8.41 slots/s

2021-01-19 04:14:22 [SYNC]          verbose: Status with future finalized epoch finalizedEpoch=10950, finalizedRoot=0x029c4ae88f81efd8b3725cb046be6f3807c50d5735bcec9142d0e019169dc266
```
